distance_rezeroing_interval.description: When the distance-to-target changes by this much since the last zeroing calculation, re-calculate zeroing. Should be smaller for projectile with a more pronounced arc.

height_rezeroing_interval.description: When the distance-to-target changes by this much since the last zeroing calculation, re-calculate zeroing. Should be smaller for projectile with a more pronounced arc.

aim_drag.description: The drag used to counteract the effect of aim force.

aim_force_multiplier.description: The force is calculated by the angle between the current aim position and the optimal position. This multiplies this force.

aim_force_max_speed.description: Max speed of the aim direction in degrees per second.

aim_force_max_angle.description: Only apply aim force aiming if the target is within this angle. Otherwise just keep aiming forward.

use_aim_force.description: [bool]Use aim_force_multiplier and and aim_drag to push the aim direction towards the optimal aim.

ignore_inheritance.description: [bool]When computing target location, ignore the inherited velocity from the muzzle moving. Can be useful for very long barreled turrets.

animate_idle_target_position.description: [bool]Animate the target position in a circular fashion when not actively targeting something else.

use_high_arc.description: [bool]If true, the zeroing compensation uses the high arc instead of the direct arc. Use for mortars.

aim_flinch_multiplier.description: How much the danger value should affect aiming

aim_flinch_decrease.description: How much the aim flinch value decreases per second

lowered_weapon_aim_offset.description: Where do we aim when weapon is lowered? The point is 10m forward + this offset

reset_aim_on_invalid_target.description: [bool]If false, this will not update our aim to the root of a dying enemy.
